comment.author: 33803904@N06
comment._content: Where was/is this building? I don't recognise it.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: Hi Marie.Frances Thanks for you comment. This is the old Supreme Court building. It was built in the 1870s, was badly damaged by fire in 1968 and was demolished in 1976 making way for the present building. Check out some other photographs of this building at State Library.

comment.author: 23268776@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Privy Council: Court Buildings of the British Empire, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Great shot, I've been looking for an old shot of the building on flickr for some time. Makes the present ugly modern court building pale in comparison DBHKer
